content.detailedDescription:
I was leaving a dinner party at the home of a friend with my wife and another couple.  the wife of the other couple we were with looked up in the sky and said, "what's that?"  at this point my wife and i looked up to see a sphere or globe like object (it reminded me of a chinese paper globe that gets released after the death of a person - hopefully that makes sense) traveling across the sky (nw to sw) in a straight line.

the sphere/globe like object was orange/red in color and was traveling at a high rate of speed.  it was completely silent - this might have been a comet, but i am not sure as i've never seen one before.  we watched the object for ~5.5 mins as it traveled across the sky and then it seemed to asend upwards and eventually dissappeared into the southwestern night.

this was absolutely errie and i am not sure if anyone else saw this in the eastern pa sky this evening, but it would be nice to know.

a longt time friend of mine told me about your website so here i am sharing this story with you.

hopefully you don't think i am a nut job.
content.summary: Was coming out of a friends home with others and obeserved this object.

content.detailedDescription:
I stepped outside  at dusk and and saw 2 objects in the western sky. the objects were red and looked as if they were burning, like flares.  however, they were moving in roughly parallel path which varied (a non-straight path) from west to south, at what appeared to be the same altitute. i called my wife outside and we both observed the objects; that's when i took the short video. we observed them until they both "blinked out".  these objects were not local aircraft; nor were they meteors. they moved too quickly and in a horizontal parallel path to be flares, and they looked fairly large when they were brightest; at 5:31pm on 12/29/13.

i have a 20 second video of these objects but am unable to upload to this site via my ipad for some reason.
content.summary: Observed two red objects in the western sky at dusk, traveling w to sw to s.

content.detailedDescription: I was woken up. couldn,t move saw small gray aliens. i could hear them in my head. they told me not be afraid. blcked out came too i was in space looking earth straped down facing a window. in my head it said im showing you earths creation. i saw two solar systems collide. very large explotion. and saw the planets form. this was like fast forward video. but it was real. i thought i died or somthing. i wasnt scared because the voice in my head sounded like james erl jones. and then it asked was their any thing els i wanted to know. then i was thinking must be dream. so i said i want to know what enstien knows. i was bad math in school so wanted to about quantum physics. i felt all this knoledg pooring in. i woke up i was very excited about what saw.This 1984 hamilton ohio one block north of where i live now. they want mr to buid a machine that doesnt excist yet. time machine. 1994 i built that machine it cost 1.3 millon. this a long story sorry for that. im spray painter the company i was working for is called c.I.P. they wsnt me to revrs engneer patened painting process called vacuform branding. useing all water base paint. so i had to keep a time log of my process. 1995 built the machine to get rid keeping logs. the time machine. my patrners tried steal my invintion by patening it. saying i had nothing to with it. but i only gave them half of the data. patent was rejected lack of data. this machine is still there.And operational its what the grays helped me build . its matrix time. two processes that proves its time machine. remeber i was bad math and designed and inevented this machine with there help. machine is 1995 le saint dr. fairfield ohio 45014. i dont work their now 2005 turned off the monopoly i created by walking away. i had a billion doller contract with kroger. want proof of aliens its me and my time machine. ps  went f.B.I. in 2007 thet wouldnt help me unless i gave them the other half of patent. i did not trust them.
content.summary: Taken too ship told to watch

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Me and my two friends decided we wanted to gaze at the stars for awhile, so we did a few minutes. after we went out we talked for a little then realized that we saw two orangey lights slowly make their way across my friends houses ( they love across from each other). we thought they were chinese lanterns but then the lights were flashing and the circle has soon hovering over a tree. we didn't know what to do so we stayed outside and waited for it to go past my other friends house. we started talking again, but after 1-2 minutes went by, we were looking at not one but two more orangey lights passing by and did the same thing and trailed off into the horizon until we could not see any of them anymore. we soon after saw an airplane shortly after about 5 minutes after though. we thought nothing of our discovery that night, until we all did little research and finally came to the conclusion(well i did at least) that those lights were ufos and to contact or report this sighting that we saw.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Watching night sky then suddenly 1-2 orangey lights came into view them 2 more redish lights and then hovered and disappeared

content.detailedDescription: Large black triangular/sphere object in downtown minneapolis below skscaper height moving slowly/hovering then moved slowly to the east 3 blocks, then accelerated and accended at 30 degree angle east/southeast towards eagan,mn. twice as fast as any commercial aircraft ive seen. no lights/ no sound. object was there when i came out for a smoke - i saw it for 5 minutes but hopefully someone else saw this too.
content.summary: Triangle in downtown minneapolis

content.detailedDescription:
On 12/28/13 i walked onto our back porch that faces the beach at around 7:00 pm and saw a reddish-orange glowing ball of light traveling south, it was a little higher than the high rise condo next 
door and actually traveled directly over it. to me it didn't look too big, about 2 to 3 feet
around, roughly.
i went to the walkway at the end of our building that leads to the beach and did not see the
ball of light by the time i got out there. a few minutes later another light came from down
the beach, it looked to be the same size as the previous light, it appeared out of nowhere, it started glowing around the area of apache pier and flew south in a straight line down the beach. it was a little windy and to me it seemed to be under power of some sort to fly that straight. after a minute or two it was almost directly over me and turned east towards the ocean. as it started to go through some low flying clouds it began to fade out but i could still see the object slowly spinning down towards the water. at this point i noticed it was an off white, maybe grey white and it looked like one end had two rounded globes and the other end was smaller but i couldn't make out the shape to well at the other end. i went to the waters edge were i watched it fall about 40 foot out into the water, it was about 
2-1/2 feet across and floated. i watched it for maybe 5 or so minutes, when i went to get my wife and came back, it was gone.
at around 8:00 pm or so i was on my back porch and saw another reddish-orange sphere, the same size as the other two and flying the same path. i tried to get it on video but it didn't turn out so good, photography is not my stronger point, as it was almost over the apartment it stopped glowing and turned off white or grey white and continued over the apartment out of my sight, we ran outside to find it but after looking everywhere we could, it couldn't be found.
later that night my wife and i observed 2 of the same lights together, which we did get video of and she reported it as well.
the previous night, 12/27/13 my wife and i watched several of these lights appear and disappear, one which flew fairly close to a commercial plane, going opposite directions. she reported those sightings, we did get pictures.
i' was in the marines and a police officer, i am trained to observe and i'm familiar with military aircraft, these lights are not any kind of aircraft or flares.      myrtle beach, sc.
content.summary: Glowing reddish orange sphere traveling south down the beach, once over me it lost its glow and drifted into the ocean were i observed it for a few minutes. another did the same but lost sight.

content.detailedDescription:
My close friend [name removed/cms/tg], piloted twin engine cessna aircraft that departed from the bahama chain of islands in 1982.
his aircraft was never seen after his departure from the bahamas.
there is short newspaper article from one of the passenger���s home town newspaper.
he was an experienced pilot. a coast guard search was conducted from southern florida to jacksonville because of the speed of the gulf stream.
i can do more research to provide possible tail number, color of the cessna etc . i do know there were 4 members on the manifest. charles was the only pilot,  the 3 others were passengers. i am fairly confident there was no drug involvement by my personal knowledge of "c".
the reason for this message is inquire a more in depth knowledge of the incident.
thank you
[name removed/cms/tg]
content.summary: Twin engine aircraft disappearence

content.detailedDescription: My family and i saw 3 objects above the ocean isle pier, nc on sat, dec 28, 2013 btwn 745 and 750 pm.  the first two were twinkling orange lights moving together from northeast to southwest and seemed to parallel the strand.  my guess is they were btwn 1000 and 2000 ft in altitude and reminded me of seeing a campfire at a distance and seemed to be orange to amber in color.  i saw no acl's and they produced no sound.  i assumed they were helicopters flying together, but did not hear blades or see any normal lights.  they seemed to gain altitude and move further off the beach and finally disappeared after less than 2 minutes.  they seemed to move about 2 miles the total time we saw them.  we have 2 very bad still pictures of them.  after about 5 minutes another single light appeared and looked be the same light and flying in the same direction.  it also gained altitude, moved further out to sea and finally disappeared.  no acl's or sound just like the first two.  we have a video of this one that is less than a minute long.  never saw anything like this before in all my years of stargazing.  i am very sure they were not helicopters because they just disappeared in the sky, no other lights and no sounds when they passed.  several other aircraft were visible in the distance.  it was partly cloudy with stars visible in the northeast.  i estimate the objects were between 35 and 45 degrees above the horizon from our vantage point.
content.summary: Lights flying across the sky and disappeard, no sound, no acl's

content.detailedDescription: I thought it was the moon behind some weird clouds and took a picture of it. i noticed it was pulsating but thought it might be the wind in the clouds. i later found out that december 3rd , 2013 (that very night) was a new moon. what exactly were we looking at?
content.summary: Lime green light caught my attention

content.detailedDescription:
I was on holiday to scotland in may 2013, i took many pics, and only saw what appears to be two orbs side by side on two pics, i only noticed the two orbs when going through pics on computer,i will post these pics as they came out and have not been processed, the are not too good but the orbs can be clearly seen.
i have not altered the pics in any way and they may not be flying saucers, but on enlarging the pics you get a better idea.
the time and date are exact.Each pic was taken consecutavely, so it may be tha the objects are the same ones in each pic.
content.summary: Only seen on pics on computer

content.detailedDescription: I was off roading in the manti-la sal national forest northwest of monticello ut.  the night of december 17, 2013 while camping on the southern edge of canyonlands national park i witnessed an object moving across the sky at about 8:00 pm.  the object was emitting a light of golden color and was moving fairly low to the ground.  periodically (every couple minutes) it would stop, hover, then descend to the ground, lift back up (after about 5 minutes) continue to travel low to the ground and repeat sequence.  as the ship came closer i could detect a low "rumble" sound unlike that of a helicopter or high flying airplane, but more like a freight train.  this lasted for about an hour and a half as the ship continued the sequence as it travelled close to our location changing directions in an apparent effort to locate suitable "landing" locations.  in the morning we went to an area we believed the ship to have landed and found several recently dead cows and one dead coyote in about a 25 yard radius.  the cows appeared to have their stomachs torn open (possibly by the coyote after they were dead), and the coyote had no visible external wounds.  other than the dead animals there was nothing abnormal about the site.
content.summary: Visual sighting and discovery of mutilated cows / coyote.

content.detailedDescription: I went outside got into my truck. felt like something was weird. looked up and noticed a black square platform looking object. was as big as a football. field. hovered over me for a few minutes then went on. i followed it down the road and it sped up leaving me. i saw it again two weeks later. same thing.. in benton arkansas off highway 5 by harps. around ten o clock. look for it..I'm sure it will be back.'
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Flying black square like object. hovered over tree tops above me then went on.

content.detailedDescription: Me my brother and dad were in the safeway parking lot when on the horizon i saw 3 red orbs rise from very low(seemed to be over water) they rose about a degree every 3 seconds. at about what i think the level the jets here fly at cruise height they stopped for about 2 minutes they either slowly moved to (from my perpective 3cm) or quickly "teleported" to there. they formed a triangle and a cross in the sky. after about 5 minutes "hovering" in a triangle or cross formation they would get very dim then go away then out of the horizon 3-6 more would come up in the same formation that the previous ones disappeared in. we went inside safeway to get the rest of the family and about 20 minutes later when we came out they were gone. some other people around us saw them too. i watched for them the entire way home and looked it up then found this site. and thats really all that happened.
content.summary: Red orbs slowly ascended formed triangle and cross shape moved then dissperated

content.detailedDescription: Orbs flying in formation.
content.summary: Saw a group of orbs hovering, formation.....

content.detailedDescription: Sometimes i have a hard time sleeping, so i decided to go outside on my porch to have a cigarette.  then while gazing up at the cloudless night sky i saw a strange looking triangular craft slowly flying in my direction.  i thought to myself:  "what the hell is that?"  i'm a military buff and familiar with both civilian and military aircraft.  i also live near the flight paths for richmond international airport and chesterfield county airport, but this glowing triangular craft was not like anything that i've ever seen before.  also, this time of night there is not much air traffic in the area, so the craft really stood out and caught my eye. the craft itself was a dull dark gun-metal color but the entire underside was lit up and glowing with a mysterious white light.  i did not see traditional manmade lights, just the entire belly of the dark triangle glowing white.  "we don't have anything like that," i thought to myself.  there were no standard green and red (starboard/port) and no headlights or tail lights as required by the faa.  this baby was a law breaker!!!  also not normal, the craft made absolutely no sound and moved really slow, much slower than even a cessna single-engine prop.  it sort of glided, but it was not a glider.  weird!  i watched it fly silently over my house and neighborhood, so i got a really good look, and it took approximately seven (7) minutes for the triangle with the white-glowing belly to cross the sky and finally disappear from view.  it was traveling on a southwest-to-northeast heading over chester, va (suburb of richmond) at approximately 2,000-3,000 feet - about the altitude of a cessna that has recently taken off from the county airport.  i thought to myself:  "that's a ufo and i wish my friend jeff was here to see it because he'd be going crazy!  yep, we don't have anything like that, it was one of 'theirs.' - a ufo piloted by e.T.S."  i've also been seeing a lot more government helicopters than usual, but i don't know if they're looking for ufos, getting ready for the sh-- to hit the fan economically and/or militarily, or all of the above?  these are weird times, and i'm just gonna take it one day at a time.
content.summary: Large dark triangular ufo with glowing white-light underside flies slowly & silently over my neighborhood

content.detailedDescription: I was walking to the grocery store when i saw what looked like red and blue police lights in the sky. in my area we do not have police helicopters so i thought it was kind of weird but not that weird. the lights were flashing rapidly from red to blue to red to blue just like a police car. then i saw it go straight upwards, then straight back downwards, then left, then right, all at extremely rapid speeds. i have pilots in my family and i know that direction changes like that are impossible for any known aircraft. then the lights stopped flashing red and blue and changed to a smaller white light that just kind of hovered but also changed direction one time from right to left then right again. then it just kind of descended behind the tree line. then shot off very fast to the north. and i could no longer see it after that.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: It flashed red and blue almost like police cars. then went up, down, left, and right all at rapid speeds. then turned white light and shot off veryfast. the altitude and direction changes were not possible for us aircraft

content.detailedDescription: On december 25, 2013 at 19:15, i was at friend's house when he screamed get outside now. while letting his dog out, he saw glowing orbs in the sky. we observed 5 orbs in a 'v' formation moving slowly from north to southwest low on the horizon with no sound. they appeared in our view over a high privacy fence and after the first 5 passed at about a mile away, more appeared following the formation. they were single file at the same altitude, not evenly spaced, some closer to each other and some further apart. i ran into the house to get my phone to take pictures. all that appeared on my screen was a tiny white spot which i will download and have someone more experienced look at. we both knew that we were viewing something unnatural and were yelling and hoping neighbours would come outside as well. there was no sound and no exhaust or blinking lights like a plane has. we are situated 20 miles from pearson international airport and these orbs were not going in that direction. we both stood in the snow without shoes to watch until the last orb appeared, then disappeared from our view into the low level clouds and this observation lasted about 4 minutes from the first formation to the last orb moving out of view. it was the most amazing experience, unlike anything else and i want to see them again. my friend worked at the gtaa and immediately checked flight tracker 24 on the internet and radar only showed two commercial aircraft in completely different locations at that exact time. my friend has always laughed at the thought of ufos, but after witnessing those orbs, he has completed changed his outlook. on my mother's grave, this event happened as i have described.
content.summary: Approximately 12 orange orbs moving slowing and without sound

content.detailedDescription:
1.- antes de darme cuenta del ovni, estaba en un campo de f���tbol jugando.
2.- derrepente sin motivo alguno voltee la vista hacia el sur.
3.- cuando mire en esa direcci���n note tres luces muy separadas entre si y muy sobresalientes de las dem���s estrellas,esas luces eran de un color como blanco/anaranjado las cuales se me hicieron muy extra���as ya que estaban totalmente est���ticas y en muy poco tiempo cambiaron de direcci���n.
4.- despu���s de observarlas fijamente las luces empezaron a moverse pero manteniendo una cierta distancia y una trayectoria hacia el sureste, estas luces parec���an ser las puntas de un objeto triangular muy grande, el cual empez��� a inclinarse y un peque���o giro de aproximadamente 45���(cuarenta y cinco grados) una punta se empez��� a elevar y las otras dos descendieron pero sin tocar el suelo y esas mismas dos luces se empezaron a separar por lo mismo de su giro, despu���s de esto la luz de mas atr���s de la parte de abajo se empez��� a apagar sin ning���n parpadeo, seguido de eso la otra luz se empez��� a apagar pero en esta luz si hubo un parpadeo, pero mas bien o mas parecido fue a uno como desvanecimiento de la luz tipo parpadeo. la tercera luz la cual era la de la punta en la parte alta dilato mas tiempo su desvanecimiento/parpadeo ya que primero era una luz sin ning���n cambio en su intensidad (tiempo aprox. 3 mins) y despu���s de apagarse la s otras dos esta empez��� a apagarse (tiempo aprox. 2 0 3 mins). durante ese momento las luces se mov���an del sur hacia el sureste.
5.- durante el acontecimiento lo que sent��� fue una especie como de emoci���n ya que es la primera vez que veo y presencio un acontecimiento as���, tambi���n sent��� una especie de escalofri��� y asombro.
6.- perd��� de vista al objeto ya que las luces desaparecieron en su totalidad durante su trayecto, despu���s de que ya no se ve���an segu��� mirando en esa direcci���n pero ya no hab���a nada ni se detectaba que la luz de las estrellas fuera obstruida por el objeto mismo.
content.summary: Objeto estático y luego cambio de dirección y posicion

content.detailedDescription: I live in a somewhat rural area not far from little rock, arkansas. i was riding home with a friend when we noticed a strange orange light in the distance. as i got closer to home, we realized we were getting closer to the light as well. as we approached we noticed it was not moving and assumed it must be a helicopter. we kept getting closer and it became apparent this was no helicopter. at this point we knew we were looking at a black triangle with a blue light (rocket engine?) at each corner. and then sequentially pulsing white to red lights in a stripe down the center. we came very very close to it, it was not very high off the ground and it began to float away, practically right overhead, very very slowly. i had him stop the car and we rolled down the windows. the craft seemed to be completely silent. i then noticed a very very small flashing red light in the distance and in the crafts direct flight path which was timed to match the sequential flashing lights on the bottom of the craft. it continued floating off into the distance.
content.summary: Black triangle hovered then slowly floated away

content.detailedDescription:
Saturday december 28th, 2013
sighting location: hamilton train station, hamilton nj
time of sighting: approximately 12:20pm est

account: 
i was waiting for a new jersey transit 12:23 pm train to stop at the hamilton nj train station, heading north en route to new york city. 

i was gazing across the tracks towards, i believe, the west, as the winter noonday sun was on my left and the trains from trenton, nj, headed north towards new york along tracks from my left to my right. 

the sky was a clear bright blue and i watched a far-off whitish airplane headed north. as it did so, i noticed beyond and behind the plane at some further distance, approximately 5 white dots in an erratic formation, rather like balloons, or birds flying.  

within the time it took me to estimate how many there were, they blinked out and vanished. at first i thought maybe they were seagulls, further away than the plane, but then, had seagulls travelled beyond my range of vision, i don't think they would have all instantly vanished at exactly the same time, but would rather, have faded from view, and changed their distance relative to one another.

there were hundreds of other passengers waiting on the track at the station, but as they were all strangers to me and busy chatting with one another, and the event was so brief, and distant, in the sky, i don't know whether anyone else spotted them. it was a rather unspectacular sighting and i shared my observations with no one else except my family at a later phone call.
content.summary: 5 dots of white light in formation spotted west of hamiltion train station, nj, 12:20pm on dec. 28, 2013

content.detailedDescription: I was walking home from the gym, looking south-west on the street. object was directly below the strange "star" which has been in the sky for months to the south-west that brightens then dims and is visible from before sunset (this "star" has been under debate as to what it is. but it is extremely bright and is visible before any other stars in the night sky). the object i saw had 3 lights total. two green and one red. the two green lights were constant while the red light blinked like a beacon light on an airplane. object made very strange maneuvers. it oscillated back and forth while descending at about 50 ft per interval. it would descend, then remain stationary at a certain elevation while oscillating from left to right, then descend and remain stationary, etc. it moved very fluidly. i am very familiar with helicopter flight behavior growing up in san diego around a lot of military craft. this moved very differently. it had three lights total, would move side to side, then descend, then move side to side, then descend. at the final descent it moved very quickly straight down over the ocean. the reason i know it was some sort of exotic craft was the way it made left to right movements, hovered, and descended. it was not like any helicopter or plane i have ever witnessed. also, the lights on the craft were not like any of the other beacon lights i have ever witnessed. first of all they were green and red, not white and red. and the two green lights remained fixed while the red light blinked intermittently.
content.summary: Disk had 2 green lights that were constant with one red light that was blinking like a becon light. strange manuevers back and forth then descent.

content.detailedDescription:
I was playing football as you can see on the video, actually to hit the can above the goal.
well, i striked but this video is from may 2013..

i was watching this video today on 29.12.2013 because i wanted to get a look at all pictures and vids happened and recorded this year. 

i stopped at this video because i wanted to check my shooting skills and so i took the slowmo and single pictures to have a better look at it. then i recognized something grey/dark/black appearing (at the beginning of the video) from the top of the building (the middle/right one). 
first of all i thought there was some dirt on my screen but after watching it a few times it  seemed to be something in the vid!!
and really, it was a unbelievable fast moving object straight-ahead from the upspring at the building with direction to north-west. this object appeared approximately in the middle of the video and flew stunning rapid in an ancle of  about 30��� upstairs to the left side out of the screen.

comparing this event to other videos of very fast moving objects, i would say this a very genuine evidence of strange objects in the sky. i don't know who or what is steering this object, however, this "craft" is no waterballon, helicopter, airplane or any kind of bird, surely some higher technology.

i'm from germany, augsburg. so may be there some language errors. pls don't judge me ;)

*the video has been taken on the sports facility of our university 5.Th of may 2013 approximately at 2pm met. i have no special tool to modify or cut the video seeing the crucial object. i hope you got some.

please contact me only on my e-mail account above if you have any questions. don't hesitate!
i would like to know what is your opinion on it and what will be the further steps..

greetings from germany
content.summary: Ufo appears suddenly and flies straight to the sky

content.detailedDescription:
I was going outside to lock my car. it was a cold, clear night. i was startled to see two bright red lights in the sky north of me moving very slowly due south.Very bright like brake lights on a car.Hold up your hand at arms length, and they were the size of your little finger nail. no noise, no navigation lights, no contrail. i am a private pilot and grew up in a nasa family so i stood there to see what happened. they were moving in a straight line with minor deviations in altitude, but moving in a straight due south manner to the west of me. after i realized they were nothing like i had ever seen before, i ran inside and got daddy. he is a navy aircrew veteran of wwii and korea and retired from nasa. by the time we got out, the two were gone, but five more had appeared in a very loose formation. they took the same path, but oddly, appeared to get smaller as the got closer and changed color to a dirty yellow. took about two minutes to go over the horizon.
 i saw sputnik, and lots of launches at the cape and i am a private pilot.These were not airplanes, helicopters, drones, ballons , etc., and i was sober. yes, i had a few drinks later!
content.summary: Bright red lights moving from n to south.

content.detailedDescription: I was in a triler on our property in the country.  when i first saw it it was at a considerable distance but was approaching and as it approached it seemd to speed up.  then it hovered right outside the trailer and covered almost the entire sky.  i turned off all the lights and tried to call family and freinds but couldn't get anybody.  at one point i went outside and thought it was humming.  after a few minutes it took off so quickly i couldn't tell what direction it went.  i did not see any structures or windows on it.  i was extremely frightened and that was why i tried to call people.  it came from a southwesterly direction but i don't know what direction it left in.  i was afraid to mention this to anyone for fear of being ridiculed.
content.summary: I saw it approaching and then hovering.   i tried to reach people on the phone but couldn't get anyone.  it took off adn vanished in an instant,  i think i hummed.  there was a glow around th edges.

content.detailedDescription: Outside on our vacation to kailua kona watching the sky, we saw a bright orange/red light/orb moving slowley across the sw sky. it was about the same height a plane would fly but it was much brighter and burnt orange. we watched it move sw for few mins, then items stopped moving.Stayed stationary for 2 or 3 min then dimmed slowly then became very bright and disappeared. it was a clear night and the orb was well below the stars
content.summary: Orange red orb moving across sw sky near kailua kona, was moving slowley across the sky stopped moving for a few minutes, the orb dimmed/faded then brighted up and disappearedfrom

content.detailedDescription:
I am writing this immediately after my sighting - although it took two hours to complete!

i live in a rural area of pennsylvania. my wife and i wake early and today we had coffee together, as we always do before she takes off for work. as usual, an hour or so after she left, i was walking our dogs in the still darkness of early morning - and, as usual, i was watching the sky while doing so.

this morning is clear with only the slightest wisps of clouds. there is a beautiful sky; full of stars and a wondrous-looking crescent-moon. aside from some light, early saturday morning traffic (coming from the road about a half-mile away), a barking-dog in the far-distance and our roosters (just waking and beginning to crow - because i've turned on some of our outside lights), the morning was very quiet: the air perfectly calm & still.

i'd only been out for a minute when i saw the lights. at first, i thought nothing much of them because, living almost due south of harrisburg and north of baltimore & washington, we're on the edge of a pretty busy air corridor and it's not uncommon to see air-liners nearing or, at their cruising altitudes; long vapor-trails crossing the sky behind them. sometimes, like "this one", they're still rather low in the sky (for some reason), so i wasn't all that impressed - at first. 

something drew my eyes back to these lights, however, and as i began to take my youngest, leashed lab from his "peeing spot" to his "pooping spot", i kept my eyes fixed on them and, considering their (assumed) altitude & the stillness of the morning, i was surprised i didn't hear anything. pondering that a bit, i paused: watching and listening closely. i had a mid-sized "mag-lite" with me (to be sure "harley" poops - which he doesn't always do!) and, just for fun, i pointed the flashlight at the lights and "blinked" it a few times, as i'd heard (or read) somewhere that "real ufos" sometimes "respond" in some way or manner. the lights didn't seem to change or acknowledge my light in any discernible way, so, taking my eyes from them for a moment, we made the 20 yard trek to the other "potty place".

now, i've had (and reported) a few ufo encounters before - one, pretty extraordinary - so, my gaze returned to the lights while harley looked for a place to "do his business". we'd only moved a short distance from where i'd originally noticed the lights, but it struck me immediately that they'd either stopped - or, slowed significantly - as they appeared to be in the same spot (or, even back a little!) as when we'd begun moving to where i now stood, watching. as an artist, i understand angles and perspective, very well, and am certain what i'm reporting is true. even if the lights hadn't stopped or slowed, they would have still appeared to have moved farther south, because i had moved parallel/opposite their direction of travel. they didn't.

thinking back on it (again: this happened only a matter of minutes ago), when i first looked back at them, they truly appeared to have become stationary for a moment - or, even to have reversed their course somewhat. then, when i began looking closely again, though, they continued at their previous... almost leisurely speed - traveling along their original flight-path. and, although i could see them clearly (four, bright, yellowish/almost amber-colored lights with a bright-white strobe in the middle), and they were really quite low (not seeming to climb at all, throughout the sighting), plus, the fact that they "must" have been relatively close... it struck me that there was still_no_sound_whatsoever_. none. and i'd "cupped" my ears at both spots, too: straining to hear. yet, no sound emanated from the lights - nor, anything else in their general direction. only on our way back inside did a small airplane's sound become audible and i spotted it easily, in the western sky - far away, much higher up and in the opposite direction of the lights i'm describing.

another thing which strikes me as odd is that the four, yellowish lights did not change their position, relative to me. in other words, had they been, say, on the nose, tail and wing-tips, their positions and appearance in relation to me (and the strobe) would have changed as they passed from my left to my right. they did not. they remained perfectly spaced and the strobe remained in the center - giving them a rather bizarre and unnatural appearance as the lights traveled in a straight line, not an arc or curving path. i have no explanation.

now, i'm assuming they were low in the sky (they were about 40 degrees above the horizon), but i must concede that - given how clear the morning was and the fact the lights did not pass in front of/behind any clouds - it is entirely possible they were much higher and farther from me than i thought them to be. if that's true, however, the lights must have been enormous! thus, i believe my description of the size, altitude & distance from me to be accurate: 100'-300' in length (although, maybe longer as, with my arm extended, they spanned half the width of my thumb). i estimate their altitude to be around 3,000' and feel i viewed from about a mile's distance (at their closest). as they took more than three or four minutes to cross my limited field of view, i'd estimate their speed at around 200 mph, or so. they sure weren't going very fast and considering there is no airport within 30 miles (or more) in that direction, if they "belonged" to a large airplane, they should have accelerated and climbed - which they didn't - and again, i stress that there was no sound, at all. heck! if they belonged to a small airplane, they'd have been even closer to me - so, i certainly would have heard something!

lastly, it occurred to me they might be a helicopter, but the relationship of the lights to each-other seem (to me) to discount that. although the (supposed) altitude and relatively low speed might correspond to some helicopter's flight characteristics, the color of the lights & their exactly symmetrical positions - and utter lack of sound (few helicopters can go that fast and they'd certainly have been audible) - eliminate the possibility of the lights representing a helicopter. i just don't buy it and am at a loss to explain the lights by assigning them to any aircraft i know of (and i know of more than a few).

i'm sorry this wasn't particularly exciting, but i wanted to be sure to describe everything as it happened because it was pretty peculiar - at least, to me! also, i should mention that my dogs showed no sign of distress or excitement. they were as playful - and obstinate - as ever! as ever, ignorance is bliss, i guess!
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: I've heard of ufos mimicking planes and may have seen them; but not like this!

content.detailedDescription: Outside with friends witnessed 3 objects come from the south at high speeds brighten the stop in triangle formation stayed visible for about a minute brightens then totally invisable 5 witness the event no plane or of earth could do what we seen second sighting within two months scary then obivious active planes and flashing like satalite were seen still seen we tried to record on cell phone objects do not apear on video but strange like ataxic sceans appear unknown what is going on this is to much somebody come through and be honest with this everyday more and more but military denies it over one of the biggest navy base in the world the truth needs to be out there we are not that stupid
content.summary: 3 objects apeared flame like to the south seemed to come together in speed stoped then went in tring form brightens the went invisble 6 witness

content.detailedDescription: Me my fianc��� and cousin was walking down m-40 highway in sw michigan gazing at the stars and my fianc��� noticed an orange fire ball in the horizon coming toward us we walked a few more feet staring at it when all of a sudden it just disappeared ! then we noticed a triangle with a smaller version of the orange ball at the top of a triangle.  we then went home and started researching it all of a sudden our power went out for a minute and there is no storm no wind no rain and no snow. about 15 mins before we saw it we had just been talking about life forms and i said there's no such thing. well i still don't believe in that stuff i do wonder what did we see and why did our power go out like that????
content.summary: Orange fire ball heading our way then suddenly disappeared

content.detailedDescription: a dark, chevron shaped object in sky, with zero lights on.  flew in a straight line moving west toward mississauga, ontario.  disappeared into the distance less than a minute later.  completely silent with zero lights on.  highly unlikely for normal aircraft at night.  sighted approx. 11:30pm (est) on dec. 23/2013.  tried to look up similar shapes online and the closest we could find but not exact to, was a b2 stealth bomber.  witnessed by 2 people on my balcony in toronto.
content.summary: Moving aircraft with zero lights or sound moving in straight line

content.detailedDescription: I was driving along kings highway in minneapolis, minnesota and as i was looking up a bright green light appeared. i got very excited as soon as i saw it because, be it a plane or not, i had never seen such a bright green color in the sky. it quickly shot down or forward towards the horizon, i am unsure of which direction because of my perspective on the ground. it did not descend softly or slowly; its movement was quick and precise. at the end of its movement, the light changed from a green to a red and then disappeared. in total, the sighting probably lasted two seconds, one and a half of which the light was green and the other half a second being red. the light disappeared before it went below the tree line. there was another passenger in the car and, although she did not see it, was frightened by my enthusiasm. i drove further towards the light, but found nothing and didn't see anything else.
content.summary: Sudden appearance of green light then quick descent, a flash of red light, then disappeared.
